rafi and at the time it was something

honestly didn't think that much about it

we met a man up there who lived in the

happy
and one thing that we both really enjoy

location independence was a key factor

Duras away from England specifically
it's the lifestyle that we've now got
that's what we wanted Thailand gave us
the opportunity to build the lifestyle

one thing that I would definitely say

here we've worked very hard from the day

and that has been a journey
so $500 a month plus three thousand

till a stage where we feel like we can

we should go I'm not happy here we would

some of those decisions were based on
